DataElement.preferredName: Study Subject Milestone Administration, Management Performed Study Activity Identifier ISO21090.II.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The completed activity which marks a study subject-specific, protocol-defined point in the course of a study. EXAMPLE(S): obtain informed consent, verify eligibility criteria, enroll, registration to a study, randomize, assignment to a treatment arm, start of on-study period, complete study visits, end of on-study period, exit trial, break treatment blind, protocol violation, premature withdrawal A unique symbol that establishes identity of an activity. EXAMPLE(S): 12345 is the identifier for a substance administration

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Study Subject Milestone Administration, Management Performed Study Activity Identifier
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A matter or an individual that is observed, analyzed, examined, investigated, experimented upon, or/and treated in the course of a particular study.:An important event in the progress, development, or history of something or in someone's life.:Performing or possessing executive duties; acting as a supervisor or manager.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active._One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Study Subject Milestone Administration, Management Performed Study Activity
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A matter or an individual that is observed, analyzed, examined, investigated, experimented upon, or/and treated in the course of a particular study.:An important event in the progress, development, or history of something or in someone's life.:Performing or possessing executive duties; acting as a supervisor or manager.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active.

Concepts.definition: A matter or an individual that is observed, analyzed, examined, investigated, experimented upon, or/and treated in the course of a particular study.
An important event in the progress, development, or history of something or in someone's life.
Performing or possessing executive duties; acting as a supervisor or manager.
Executed and carried through to completion.
A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.
